title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
description: The column icons are not displaying as expected when connecting to a Derby database.
OB: Upon connecting to a Derby database and creating a dataset, the column icons in the Edit Data Set window do not appear.
EB: The column icons should be visible in the Edit Data Set window when connected to a Derby database, allowing users to interact with and manage dataset columns effectively.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new project.
2. Generate a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select 'Query.'
6. [Additional steps needed to provide more clarity based on context]
